item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (465 points | 126 comments)
2. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (101 points | 20 comments)
3. Sainsbury Wing contractors find 1990 letter from donor (207 points | 47 comments)
4. DisTrO – a family of low latency distributed optimizers (36 points | 9 comments)
5. Blitzortung – real time lightning strikes around the world (91 points | 22 comments)
6. EasyPost (YC S13) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. 5000x Faster CRDTs (8 points | 1 comment)
8. The Simple Algorithm That Ants Use to Build Bridges (2018) (19 points | 1 comment)
9. The Monospace Web (83 points | 13 comments)
10. KLEE Symbolic Execution Engine (16 points | 2 comments)
11. Taskwarrior – CLI Task Management (16 points | 3 comments)
12. How Chrome Accessibility Works (11 points | discuss)
13. Vulnerabilities show why STARTTLS should be avoided if possible (2021) (41 points | 13 comments)
14. Starliner Is Such a Disaster That Boeing May Cancel the Entire Project (20 points | 5 comments)
15. Grace Hopper on Future Possibilities: Data, Hardware, Software, and People (36 points | 1 comment)
16. UltimateAntiCheat (52 points | 53 comments)
17. Rustproofing Linux (Part 1/4 Leaking Addresses) (2023) (33 points | 2 comments)
18. Launch HN: Bucket Robotics (YC S24) – Defect detection for molded and cast parts (62 points | 17 comments)
19. U.S. Ambassador says Canadians are consuming 'unhealthy' amount of American news (109 points | 117 comments)
20. Malware infiltrates Pidgin messenger's official plugin repository (88 points | 9 comments)
21. Anthropic publishes the 'system prompts' that make Claude tick (289 points | 180 comments)
22. Splatt3R: Zero-Shot Gaussian Splatting from Uncalibrated Image Pairs (98 points | 23 comments)
23. PyRoboCOP: Python-Based Robotic Control and Optimization Package (7 points | discuss)
24. A New Wave of Underwater Comms Is Coming (30 points | 9 comments)
25. Why is the Oral-B iOS app almost 300 MB? And why is Colgate's app even bigger..? (159 points | 140 comments)
26. Docker Performance Evaluation Across Operating Systems (26 points | 27 comments)
27. Unlocking the Pixel 9 bootloader breaks some Pixel AI apps (50 points | 27 comments)
28. New 0-Day Attacks Linked to China's 'Volt Typhoon' (167 points | 35 comments)
29. Your Immune System Is Not a Muscle (87 points | 49 comments)
30. Zuckerberg claims regret on caving to White House pressure on content (358 points | 713 comments)
